Question: In 1987, this person published her first novel, Postcards from the Edge.
Hints: This person published a sequel to Postcards, The Best Awful There Is, in 2004.
During an interview with AMC **** said that she actually has no regrets doing the Star Wars series.
In August 2006, this person appeared prominently in the audience of the Comedy Central's Roast of William Shatner.
